entry.title: Adding and removing GPG uid's
entry.summary: A GPG master key can be associated with multiple subkeys and multiple identities. If your key is well signed there is some value in keeping it as your identity evolves. For example, if you became an Apache Foundation committer you might get an @apache.org e-mail address. If you change jobs you might lose one e-mail address but gain another. You don't need to throw away the signatures for the e-mail address you are keeping. Obviously adding a new e-mail address to an existing key does not mean that the new identity is as immediately well trusted.
